ngiemboon: Múɔ wɔɔn tsaŋté na guɔ yɔɔn tɛʼ.
en: This child suffered a lot from this illness.
He bought the pork for eight thousand.

ngiemboon: Múɔ tsigé, á gɔɔn ngie ntsàʼ múɔ.
en: The child sneezed, he said your wishes.
appellation of the wife’s father by the husband’s family
attack by poking with a finger
do a ritual before tasting the first fruits
